New Records: Tim Southee became the first player to bowl four maidens in a T20 World Cup match.
Trent Boult ended his Twenty20 international career with this match.
Key Match Events: Trent Boult and Tim Southee shared the new ball and contributed significantly with quick wickets.
Lockie Ferguson also made quick contributions with the wickets.
Pre-Game Insights: Trent Boult expressed mixed emotions about the tournament ending and his career.
Post-Match Reflections: Trent Boult reflected on the tournament and his career, expressing pride in the team's efforts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was affected by a weather delay.
The Black Caps finished third in their group despite early defeats.
